comment: Line 27 in [Baer] p. 110. We use ` C ` for Baer's u. Our unit vector ` E ` has the required properties for his w by ~ hdmapevec2 . Our ` ( ( S `` E ) `` C ) ` means the inner product ` <. C , E >. ` i.e. his f(u,w) (note argument reversal). (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2015.)
